text:
A bit about my day on Wednesday!
*I worked:* from 8AM to 1PM (I decided to take a half day ... I'll make up for it on the weekend!)
*I worked on:* some high level thinking about our business over the next few months and confirming with my co-founder which direction we should go in vs what direction potential customers/investors might want us to go on. It's good to keep stakeholders in mind.
*My colleague gave me feedback:* saying I made some good points on high level thinking. :muscle:
*I read:* a bit about the budget the government announced and was thankful there were no impacts on our business and startup! always good to keep an eye on the bigger picture that might effect your plans.
*I felt:* like taking a much needed afternoon off. I'll get back on top of things Thursday...:stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:

My little update from today!
*Today I worked:* from 9AM to (probably) 10PM with a few hours off at lunch to go to the gym!
*Today tasks / activities I worked on:* brainstorming / firming up a "10-year" plan for the business as well as thinking about what to say on a sales call on Friday. Lots of coffee required today! :coffee:
*Today my colleague told me:* that they appreciate that we take gym breaks. We get back to the desk feeling refreshed!
*Today I'm learning / reading:* a bit about dynamic websites i.e. making them more responsive to different devices
*Today I felt:* a little frustrated as felt I didn't get much "done" on paper, but lots of brainstorming and interesting thoughts flying around on our whiteboards!

What are your next steps over the coming year with regards to uni applications / jobs / exams etc? Is there anything that comes to mind that I can help with over the next week or so left of the programme?
